           style="width:100%; padding:.5rem; border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:8px;">

    <label for="lastName" style="display:block; margin-top:.6rem; font-weight:600;">Last Name</label>
    <input id="lastName" name="lastName" type="text" required autocomplete="family-name"
           style="width:100%; padding:.5rem; border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:8px;">

    <label for="affiliation" style="display:block; margin-top:.6rem; font-weight:600;">Affiliation</label>
    <input id="affiliation" name="affiliation" type="text" autocomplete="organization"
           style="width:100%; padding:.5rem; border:1px solid #ccc; border-radius:8px;">

    <button type="submit"
            style="margin-top:1rem; padding:.6rem 1rem; border:0; border-radius:8px; cursor:pointer;">

    </button>

<script>
  
  const WEB_APP_URL =
    "https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbz_JkgiIFZNZlUv1OHENZJJvqQbEyRB3azFXZNKuaKwuYc_tNAPGgmDpPmsRhLLDBE/exec";

  const form = document.getElementById("signup-form");
  const msg  = document.getElementById("signup-msg");

  form.addEventListener("submit", async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    msg.textContent = "Submitting…";

    const payload = {
      email:       document.getElementById("email").value.trim(),
      firstName:   document.getElementById("firstName").value.trim(),
      lastName:    document.getElementById("lastName").value.trim(),
      affiliation: document.getElementById("affiliation").value.trim()
    };

    try {
      await fetch(WEB_APP_URL, {
        method: "POST",
        mode: "no-cors",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify(payload)
      });
      form.reset();
      msg.textContent = "Thanks! You're on the list.";
    } catch (err) {
      console.error(err);
      msg.textContent = "Sorry—something went wrong. Please try again.";

  });
</script>

Welcome to the homepage for the newly formed (November, 2025) Vancouver, BC Canada Chapter of the Society for Conservation GIS.

This group aims to bring together the community of conservation related Geographic Information System (GIS) related individuals across Vancouver and the greater region of southern British Columbia.

Our chapter is an affiliated chapter of the [Society for Conservation GIS (SCGIS)](https://www.scgis.org/ "SCGIS Organization Homepage"). The SCGIS helps bring together conservation practitioners and GIS technology by supporting communication and networking, scholarships, and training across the world through a system of connected [chapters](https://www.scgis.org/chapters "Check out other SCGIS chapters around the world!")in various cities and countires. Membership is open to anyone looking to engage in a GIS conservation related community.

# Upcoming Events

As a chapter we plan to host semi-regular events consisting of talks, workshops, and meetups including citizen science/conservation events outdoors, and socials! 

This schedule will be developed and begin in 2026, sign up to our mailing list (above) and follow us on our social media page for updates.
